original_text: So we should come near to God and we should not be afraid. But we must be honest and we must continue to trust him. He has made us clean from the dirt of our sins. Our thoughts no longer give us trouble about our sins. We have become clean. It is like he has washed our bodies with clean water. 10: In the old agreement, they threw the blood of a sacrifice on the priests to show that they were clean. But in the new agreement, God has made us completely clean, not just on the outside. At a Christian baptism, they use water to show that a person now believes in Christ. That person is now clean because of the death of Christ as a sacrifice on his behalf. So we should come near to God and we should not be afraid. But we must be honest and we must continue to trust him. He has made us clean from the dirt of our sins. Our thoughts no longer give us trouble about our sins. We have become clean. It is like he has washed our bodies with clean water. 10: In the old agreement, they threw the blood of a sacrifice on the priests to show that they were clean. But in the new agreement, God has made us completely clean, not just on the outside. At a Christian baptism, they use water to show that a person now believes in Christ. That person is now clean because of the death of Christ as a sacrifice on his behalf. So we should come near to God and we should not be afraid. But we must be honest and we must continue to trust him. He has made us clean from the dirt of our sins. Our thoughts no longer give us trouble about our sins. We have become clean. It is like he has washed our bodies with clean water.
korean_text: 우리가 마음에 뿌림을 받아 악한 양심으로부터 벗어나고 몸은 맑은 물로 씻음을 받았으니 참 마음과 온전한 믿음으로 하나님께 나아가자

sentences.original_text: So we should come near to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 하나님께 가까이 나아가야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and we should not be afraid
But we must be honest
and we must continue to trust him
He has made us clean
from the dirt of our sins
Our thoughts no longer give us trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 생각은 더 이상 우리를 괴롭히지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: about our sins
We have become clean
It is like he has washed our bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 우리 몸을 씻으신 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: with clean water
In the old agreement
they threw the blood of a sacrifice
on the priests
to show that they were clean
But in the new agreement
God has made us completely clean
not just on the outside
At a Christian baptism
they use water
to show that a person now believes in Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 이제 그리스도를 믿는다는 것을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: That person is now clean
because of the death of Christ
as a sacrifice on his behalf
So we should come near to God
